{{Wired embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi Zero |revision=(512MB) V1.2 |asin= |price=5 |manuf_country=UK |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |est_release_date=10/2015 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2835 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=B4432BBPA-1D-F |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none=true |flags=Micro SD Card slot, Mini HDMI output, GPIO, |tp_firmware= }} :[https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/pi-zero/ Product page]
''Raspberry Pi Zero V1.2 © Raspberry Pi 2015'' is silkscreened on the board.
{{WPLink|Raspberry_Pi}} {{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series}}
===Specifications=== *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Zero]] (512MB) • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-zero/ Blog] ([https://shop.pimoroni.com/products/raspberry-pi-zero Shop]) :SoC: [[Broadcom]] BCM2835 Single-core CPU (ARM11) @1.0GHz :512MB RAM (''Elpida'' B4432BBPA-10-F), Mini HDMI (1080p60) :Micro SD, USB OTG ports, Micro USB data/power, 40-pin GPIO
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/11/26/raspberry-pi-zero-is-a-5-board-based-on-broadcom-bcm2835-processor/ ''Raspberry Pi Zero board based on Broadcom BCM2835'' on '''CNX|Software''']
